code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LoanSearch=_ref=>{let{setLoans}=_ref;const[searchQuery,setSearchQuery]=useState('');const handleSearch=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const response=await fetch("http://localhost:5000/api/loans/search?query=".concat(searchQuery));const data=await response.json();setLoans(data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching loans:',error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Buscar Pr\xE9stamo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSearch,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"form-group",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"form-control",placeholder:"Buscar por cliente o estado",value:searchQuery,onChange:e=>setSearchQuery(e.target.value)})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"btn btn-primary",children:"Buscar"})]})]});};export default LoanSearch;
